analysis.description: Exchange.isContract (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in Exchange.exchangeTokenToEther (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol#198-232):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(_from) (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol#211-212)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(_from,this,_tokenAmount)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol#217-218)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountQuotaUsed (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol#220-222)

Exchange.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol#164-169) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_address,_amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol#166-169)

Exchange.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol)
	- /unique_chucks/24/0xbcb03c4b10f04e568abf88df136f579038dd0ef1.sol
